description: Publicity hound and director of Sakura TV. He initially appears when Amane Misa sends four videotapes to Sakura TV in order to gain attention from the real Kira, and approves of broadcasting the tapes on live TV. However, he is forced to hand the tapes over to Soichiro, who crashes a police wagon into the studio and threatens him at gunpoint.
name: Demegawa Hitoshi
